definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
One world - one dream, motto of 2008 Beijing Olympic games
pinyin: tong2 yi1 ge4 shi4 jie4 , tong2 yi1 ge4 meng4 xiang3
containing_words.word: 同一个世界，同一个梦想

definition: One world - one dream, motto of 2008 Beijing Olympic games
pinyin: tong2 yi1 ge4 shi4 jie4 , tong2 yi1 ge4 meng4 xiang3
containing_words.word: 同一个世界，同一个梦想

definition: (coll.) to have a lot in common (with sb)/to get along well with each other

pinyin: xing4 tong2 yi1 xing4 zhang4 ai4

sentences.english: It's the plural for heaven, so the heavens or the heavenly places is this Greek word.
sentences.chinese: 这里用的是复数，天国和神圣之地是同一个希腊词。

sentences.english: The two traditions have coexisted in the country, region, and generally within the same individual.
sentences.chinese: 这两个传统并存的国家，地区，一般在同一个人。

sentences.english: "If it's the same unknown subject," Rizzoli said.
sentences.chinese: “如果是同一个人干的话”，芮黎真说。

sentences.english: The therapy programs in the double-blinded trial and open-label trail are the same.
sentences.chinese: 开放试验和双盲试验遵循同一研究方案。

sentences.english: There's a businessman named Rob in one of my classes.
sentences.chinese: 有一位叫做罗勃的商人跟我修同一门课。

sentences.english: Here Xuan developed Liezi dream of the same theory.
sentences.chinese: 这里周宣发展了列子的梦想同一的理论。

sentences.english: So when we come to personal identity which we will do in later lecture.
sentences.chinese: 所以，等到我们在后面的课上讲到人格同一性时。

sentences.english: You can also combine multiple transformation animations in the same element.
sentences.chinese: 还可以在同一个元素中组合多个转换动画。

sentences.english: The number of wire shall be one roll by one bobbin.
sentences.chinese: 必须是一种规格线径于同一个线架。

sentences.english: We are living in the same planet, having the same blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 我们生活在同一个地球，拥有同一片蓝天。

sentences.english: Each of the nine planets turns on its own axis.They all go around the sun the same way.
sentences.chinese: 九大行星都自转，它们又都围着太阳按同一方向转动。

sentences.english: Scientists say that working the body and mind at the same time revitalizes brain cells.
sentences.chinese: 科学家说，工作在同一时间，身体和精神赋活脑细胞。

sentences.english: And in the same time, Hainan Special Economic Zone was established.
sentences.chinese: 海南经济特区成立于同一时间。

sentences.english: The winner is the first to draw three people in one space.
sentences.chinese: 在同一个中央先画完三个人者获胜。

sentences.english: These let you play split screen multiplayer games on the same machine.
sentences.chinese: 这些让你玩上分在同一台机器屏幕多人游戏。

sentences.english: You have to level with the employee who isnot measuring up.
sentences.chinese: 你必须把自己与那些不合格的员工摆在同一个水平上。

definition: exactly the same (idiom)/carbon copy/also pr. [yi1 mo2 yi1 yang4]
